gremlins

Class Gremlin

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.GameObject
      • gremlins.Creature
        • gremlins.Gremlin

  • public class Gremlin
extends Creature
    Class Gremlin extending Creature class, gremlins changes direction when colliding with walls and shoot slimes on an interval. Aside from shooting, gremlins respawn if killed and can be frozen by power up.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gremlins.Creature

        y - y coordinate
        sprite - sprite
        enemyCooldown - interval for shooting slims

      • respawn

        public void respawn(java.util.ArrayList<FreeTile> freeTileList,
                    int wizardX,
                    int wizardY)
        Respawn gremlins. If gremlin is shot, respawn on a free tile at a distance of at least 10 blocks away from the wizard.
        Parameters:
        freeTileList - list of free tiles
        wizardX - wizard's x coordinate
        wizardY - wizard's y coordinate
